title: Blueprint, "Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Dressing Room and Bathroom", June 15, 1933
medium: Blueprint and graphite on white wove paper
markings: Stamp in lower right corner: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in stamp, lower right: 3/4"=1'0"/503, STONE/DESKEY/ 6/15/33, 6/15, 8; dimensions, instructions, and materials throughout.
description: Plan and elevations for dressing room and conjoined bathroom in Rockefeller apartment. Large dressing room with carpeted floor, entrance to carpeted foyer at lower left corner of room. Shelves/closet space (?) along right wall with shelves, and trays to slide out. Entrance to bathroom in lower right corner of room. Bathroom floor in Belgium Black alternate linoleum. Tub at left, sink and vanity mirror at center, and toilet at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Dressing Room and Bathroom", June 15, 1933.
June 15, 1933. Blueprint and graphite on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-488.
